title: Firefox si blocca dopo alcune tab aperte .
content:
mio sistema: Windows 10 Enterprise versione 20H2 Dell Precision 7750 Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-10885H CPU @ 2.40GHz 2.40 GHz 16,0 GB (15,6 GB utilizzabile) firefox 94.0 64bit

Questo succede da alcuni mesi.

Grazie

title: Cant turn block autoplay OFF
content:
Hi,

I've been trying to enable autoplay on youtube.

I have given youtube permission in every window and setting I can find.

Firefox is STILL blocking autoplay. I've tried to allow autoplay globally and it still blocks it. The only extension I have installed is NoScript, in which nothing on youtube is blocked.

This is also a fresh install of both firefox and OS.

So how can I turn autoplay blocking off?

I got a couple different errors when trying to log in which ended up with me eventually resetting my password which apparently reset my whole account?

Any idea what could have happened?

This is in FF 94

title: Verze s www
content:
Dobrý den všem,

jak vypnu nebo nastavím FF tak aby nezkoušel možnost s www. Na příklad zadám adresu aasdasd.cz a někdy stránka odpoví "Hmm, tuto stránku se nám nedaří najít". Adresa zůstane na https://aasdasd.cz/ Někdy se stane, že FF odpoví "Hmm, tuto stránku se nám nedaří najít", ale adresa se sama přepíše na https://www.aasdasd.cz/ Kde se vypíná, nastavuje volba něco jako "použít www" Dík předem. P.

title: Firefox 94 cannibalized my home page!
content: Had to shut down Firefox because it was not working properly. Restarted it and it said it was installing updates, please wait. Then it started and had a popup something about colour-something. No introduction to what that is, no idea what it's talking about. Clear out of that and then it's just a plain Firefox logo with a Google search bar in the middle of the screen. Very weird, since Firefox loves to tell me all about the new stuff they added/changed/messed with. But nothing, just this search bar. Whatever, I go about my business. Then I hit the Home icon and it's back to that search bar. WHERE IS MY HOME PAGE?! Why would you overwrite my home page? SO RUDE! Just wondering what other relied-upon-settings you reset.
creator: saladgoat

title: Windows 10 - Firefox browser (93) and PDF changes
content:
Others have asked similar questions but mine hasn't been addressed yet...

I am on Windows 10 and my Firefox browser is at version 93. Ever since the last update, ALL of my PDF files now show up in file explorer as "Firefox HTML" documents. I have changed it so that they open as Acrobat PDF, but the file extentions all got changed from PDF to HTML. Even when I create/save them as .pdf, Firefox automatically changes them. I DO NOT LIKE THIS!! It makes them impossible to tell apart from actual HTML files in the file list!! I have not yet tried uploading the to Google Drive or attaching them to emails and sending that way. This is a MESS. How can I restore it such that Firefox leaves my PDFs alone???? Whose brilliant idea was this to begin with and WHY???
creator: s_melton2004

title: Private Mode
content:
When I access certain web sites in Private Mode, the browser delays about 4 seconds before loading the web site, but when using Firefox in regular mode, the web site loads normally. I notice this only with some non-https web sites (http).

This does not happen with other browsers; for example, Incognito Mode in Chrome does not have this issue.

I have tested Firefox on numerous installations both old and new on numerous PCs, and it always does this.

What is the problem? Is it a bug in Firefox or an anomaly with the way some non-https web sites interact with Firefox?
creator: les25

title: deleted secondary email still link to my account
content: I registered my account using email <A>, and the primary email is <A>. Then I want to change it to email , so I followed the tutorial https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/change-primary-email-address-firefox-accounts . I added <B> as my secondary email, then set <B> primary email. So <A> became secondary email and I removed it. But when I tried to login in, I typed email <A>, the website warned me to use my primary email (I know it is <B>). And I still receive email in my <A> from firefox. So there are still a connection between email <A> and my firefox account. How to solve it?
